page.title: 03LOCH OF CLANS GOLLANFIELD
page.content: The Loch of the Clans is beside Bemuchlye Farm.Bonnie Prince Charlie was supposed to have slept there with his army before the {Battle of {Culloden.} The loch starts in a boggy place and runs into clear water.It has started to silt up and is now very small. The loch side would have been covered with Conifers and Scots Pine which would have given Charlie and his followers cover if they ever got attacked in the night. Now the Scots Pine is very scarce.Infact the trees on the side of the loch are partly dying,but all is not lost; the seedlings are coming through which is good news for all the wildlife ;these include,osprey, hawks,heron,swan,and Canadian geese.
